titleStmt.title: SII 14.238: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 238. (A.R. No. 97 of 1908.) TIRUPPATTŪR, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE maṇḍapa IN THE TIRUTTAḶĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record is dated in the 17th year of the king. It registers a gift of money left with the mūlaparishad of the village by a merchant of Aruviyūr alias Dēśi-uyyavandapaṭṭaṇam named Vaḍugaṉ Uyyavandāṉ of Tañjāvūr, for a flower garden for the supply of karumugai flowers to the temple of Tiruttaḷiyāṇḍa-Nāyaṉār at Tirupputtūr. The flower-garden was called Kīḻaittoṇḍiyūraṉ-Uyyavandāṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñ jayamaṭantaiyun tiruppuyaṅkaḷi liṉitiruppa Irunilamum perumai yeyta Eṇṭicaiyuṅ koṭai niḻaṟṟa maṉṉava-cellām vantiṟaiñaca marapi
le varu maṇi muṭi cūṭit teṉkumariyum vaṭakaṅkaiyun tiraikkaṭale Ellaiyākap pār muḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭaṉ vaḷara manniya virasiṅkāsaṉattu mukkok kiḻānaṭikaḷo
ṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya māmutal matikkulam viḷakkiya komutal koccaṭaiyapaṟmarāṉa tripuvaṉaccakkaravarttikaḷ [śrīva]llavadevarkku yāṇṭu 10 7Āvatu keraḷaciṅka vaḷa nāṭṭu brahma
deyan tiruppūttūr mulaparuṣaiyom Innāṭṭu Aruviyūrāṉa teci Uyyavanta paṭṭaṇattu viyāpāri tañcāvūr kiḻavaṉ vaṭukaṉ Uyyavantāṉ Ivvūr śrītaḷi parameśvararkku Ittevar te
vatānam paṭaiyāṇi vāykkāl teṟkil ceri vayakkal kiḻait toṇṭiyūraṉ Uyya vantāneṉṉun tirunantavāṉam karumukait tiruppaḷḷittāmam Ākkutaṟkuc cantirā tittavaṟ Ittevar śrīpa
ṇṭārattuk kūttāṭiyāl nāḷ 1- kku viṭakkaṭava ḷa pa -m puṭavai mutalukku Orāṇṭukkuk kācu 1- m celuttuvatāka śrīpaṇṭārattu Ivaṉ Oṭukkiṉa cempoṉ kācukallāl patinoru kaḻañ
ce Āṟumañcāṭiyum śrīpaṇṭārattile Oṭukkuvittukkoṇṭu Iṉta vastuvukku � Iṉ nellupayañ celuttuvomāka kalveṭṭuvittuk kuṭuttom mulaparuṣaiyom . Itu panmāhe
śvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 14.238 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
